name: Fairbanc Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an AI-powered mobile loan and payments platform intended to offer credit without collateral or credit history. The company's platform provides read digital footprints such as transaction history with large suppliers and data on the mobile phone to grant an instant digital credit line, enabling small and medium enterprises to purchase inventories from selected suppliers.
